body_html: I see that this is significantly more complicated than just entering a GradWhileContext for each input as the frame has to be the same when the Executor tries to run the kernels. Currently focusing on the forwardAccumulator of historical values for a given context to see if I can get the frames to match up.

body: I see that this is significantly more complicated than just entering a GradWhileContext for each input as the frame has to be the same when the Executor tries to run the kernels. Currently focusing on the forwardAccumulator of historical values for a given context to see if I can get the frames to match up.
